content.text:
# 2003 St. George Illawarra Dragons season

|cup_result=|cup=|coach=Nathan Brown|captain2=|captain=Trent Barrett|avg_attendance=13,061|assistant_coach=|year=2003}}The 2003 St. George Illawarra Dragons season was the fifth in the joint venture club's history. The Dragons competed in the NRL's 2003 premiership season. The team finished tenth in the regular season, missing out on finals for the second time in their history.
